name: Verify user is able to update storage data

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to update storage data ({Equipment category=Freezer, Supplier=Haier, Equipment Type/Model=BFRV55, Status=Non Functional})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
Validate login button on home page
When User click on login button
Click login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Click proceed to login button: English
Then User login as "Store Operator"
User login: Store Operator
And User select "Store Operator" from "Role" in "Welcome" tab
Select value from dropdown: Store Operator, Role
Wait for time: 2
And User click on "Apply" button
Click on button: Apply
And User click on "Store Data" tab
Click on tab: Store Data
And User wait for "2" seconds
Wait for time: 2
Given User click on edit button of newly created storage data
And User wait for "1" seconds
Wait for time: 1
And User select "Freezer" from "Equipment category" in "Store Data" tab
Select value from dropdown store data: Freezer, Equipment category
And User wait for "1" seconds
Wait for time: 1
And User select "Haier" from "Supplier" in "Store Data" tab
Select value from dropdown store data: Haier, Supplier
And User wait for "1" seconds
Wait for time: 1
And User select "BFRV55" from "Equipment Type/Model" in "Store Data" tab
Select value from dropdown store data: BFRV55, Equipment Type/Model
And User enter random text in "equipmentName"
Enter random text: equipmentName
Generate randomtext
And User select "Non Functional" from "Status" in "Store Data" tab
Select value from dropdown store data: Non Functional, Status
When User click on "Update" button
Click on button: Update
Then Storage Data is updated successfully
Validate updated message displayed
And Storage Data is visible in storage data table to user

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given User click on edit button of newly created storage data
And User wait for "1" seconds
And User select "<Equipment category>" from "Equipment category" in "Store Data" tab
And User wait for "1" seconds
And User select "<Supplier>" from "Supplier" in "Store Data" tab
And User wait for "1" seconds
And User select "<Equipment Type/Model>" from "Equipment Type/Model" in "Store Data" tab
And User enter random text in "equipmentName"
And User select "<Status>" from "Status" in "Store Data" tab
When User click on "Update" button
Then Storage Data is updated successfully
And Storage Data is visible in storage data table to user
